name: voygen-api
description: Voygen API server for Render.com hosting

scripts.build: npm run install-librechat && npm run patch-librechat-ui && npm run build-all
scripts.install-librechat: npm run clone-librechat && npm run setup-librechat
scripts.setup-librechat: cd librechat && corepack enable && if [ -f yarn.lock ]; then yarn -v && yarn install; else NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm ci --include=dev; fi && node -e "const fs=require(\"fs\");const f=\"client/package.json\";const j=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(f,\"utf8\"));if(j.scripts&&j.scripts.build&&j.scripts.build.includes(\" vite build\")&&!j.scripts.build.includes(\" npx vite build\")){j.scripts.build=j.scripts.build.replace(\" vite build\",\" npx vite build\");fs.writeFileSync(f,JSON.stringify(j,null,2));console.log(\"Patched client build to use npx vite\");} else {console.log(\"No patch needed for client build\");}" && cp ../librechat.yaml . && cd ..
scripts.build-all: tsc && cd librechat && if [ -f yarn.lock ]; then yarn run frontend; else npm run frontend; fi && cd ..
scripts.start-librechat: cd librechat && if [ -f yarn.lock ]; then PORT=$PORT yarn run backend; else PORT=$PORT npm run backend; fi

author: Voygen Team
